metadata.feature_description: Allows users to browse, search, and filter files including images, documents, and other file types within the portal.

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Assets > My Website
steps.expected: Assets panel opens showing root folder contents
steps.actual: Assets panel opened showing folders (Badges, Groups, Images, etc.) and files in the root directory

steps.expected: Navigate into Images folder showing subfolders and image files
steps.actual: Navigated to Images folder, breadcrumb shows HOME > IMAGES, subfolders (FolderToMove, MoveMe, Publisher) and image files visible

steps.expected: Navigate to deeper level showing 3-level hierarchy
steps.actual: Navigated to Publisher folder, breadcrumb shows HOME > IMAGES > PUBLISHER with image files displayed

steps.action: Click on Images in breadcrumb to navigate back
steps.expected: Return to Images folder using breadcrumb navigation
steps.actual: Successfully returned to Images folder via breadcrumb click

steps.action: Enter 'test' in the Search Files textbox and press Enter
steps.expected: Search results show files containing 'test' in their names
steps.actual: Search found multiple files with 'test' in filename: test_image.jpg, test_image.png, test_image2.png, etc. Breadcrumb shows SEARCH 'TEST'

steps.action: Search for 'special' to find files with special characters
steps.expected: Find files containing special characters in their names
steps.actual: Found test_special_!@#chars.txt file with special characters highlighted

steps.action: Enter only special characters '@#' in search
steps.expected: Search should handle special character input
steps.actual: Search field accepts special characters but search does not re-execute with only special characters - requires alphanumeric text

steps.action: Search for 'nonexistent12345' which has no matches
steps.expected: Display appropriate message for no results
steps.actual: Displayed 'Your Search Produced No Results' message with search icon

steps.expected: Display empty folder message with guidance
steps.actual: Displayed 'This Folder is Empty' with text 'Use the tools above to add an asset or create a folder'

steps.action: Hover over an image file to view actions and thumbnail preview
steps.expected: Show thumbnail preview and action buttons
steps.actual: Image files show thumbnail previews in grid view. Hovering shows action buttons: Edit, Move, Copy, Download, Delete

steps.action: Click on Sort dropdown to view options
steps.expected: Show sort options: Last Modified, Date Uploaded, Alphabetical
steps.actual: Sort dropdown opened showing three options: Last Modified, Date Uploaded, Alphabetical (currently selected)

steps.expected: Files should be reordered by last modified date
steps.actual: Files reordered - folder order changed from alphabetical (FolderToMove, MoveMe, Publisher) to modified order (MoveMe, Publisher, FolderToMove)

steps.action: Search for '.png' to filter PNG images
steps.actual: Search returned only PNG files: cavalier-tv.png, test_image2.png, full-star.png, etc. with .png highlighted in filenames

steps.action: Search for '.txt' to filter text documents
steps.actual: Search returned only TXT files: version_test.txt, workflow_test_file.txt, subfolder_upload_test.txt, test_special_!@#chars.txt

steps.action: Navigate to Home folder with 'Last Modified' sort selected
steps.expected: Files should appear sorted by most recently modified
steps.actual: Files displayed in order of last modification - most recently modified folders and files appear first (Templates, Groups, RenamedSecureFolder, etc.)

observations: No dedicated 'Images Only' or 'Documents Only' filter buttons exist in the UI - filtering by file type is achieved through search by extension (e.g., .png, .txt)
Clicking directly on a file downloads it rather than opening a preview dialog - thumbnail previews are shown in the grid view
Secure folders are indicated with a lock icon on the folder thumbnail (e.g., RenamedSecureFolder)
Draft files are indicated with a 'Draft' badge and some show an X icon indicating possible broken/missing thumbnails
The search requires at least some alphanumeric characters - searching with only special characters (@#) does not trigger a new search
